Title: Squigmancer
Legend: Squigmancers experience such vivid fungus-brew hallucinations that their magics spill out to animate the fungi around them and bring their visions to life. This can have deeply unpleasant effects for anyone stood too close!

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Squigmonger, Squigmancer, Squigcap Shaman and Squig Herder with Mini-Mangler must be taken as a set for a total of 240 points. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Bosses of the Skrap • Squigapalooza

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONA Squigmancer is a single model armed with a Moon Staff and Jaggedy Knife.

Rules.Name: Hallucinogenic Fungus Brews
Rules.Fluff: Squigapalooza shamans drink long draughts of hallucinogenic fungus brew before the battle begins, making them almost impervious to pain. However, as the battle progresses the effects start to wear off.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In the first battle round, this unit has a ward of 5+. In the second battle round, this unit has a ward of 6+.

Rules.Name: Slippery Git
Rules.Fluff: Squigapalooza shamans seek to put as many of their fellow squigs between themselves and incoming enemy fire as possible.
Rules.Rule: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target this model while it is within 3" of a friendly MOONCLAN unit with 3 or more models.

Rules.Name: Fungoid Cloud
Rules.Rule: MAGICThis model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast one spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Fungoid Cloud spell.

Rules.Name: Fungoid Cloud
Rules.Fluff: The Squigmancer stamps upon the squig he rides, releasing a cloud of magical spores that engulfs the enemy.
Rules.Rule: Fungoid Cloud has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 8" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit, and subtract 1 from save rolls for attacks that target that unit.
